text: The only place that matters is first.
I am the best driver because I believe that I am the best. Every driver needs to think like that.
I was never 'Mad Max.' I was just Max who was trying to get the best result for the team.
If my mom had balls, she'd be my dad.
The biggest critic I have in my life is my dad, so everything else is just a breeze.
I think you can improve on everything; you're never perfect.
We are getting way too much info in the cockpit. Sometimes I switch off the display in my car!
If you are not allowed to defend, what's racing about then?
I want to win because I am the fastest out there, not by luck.
